question.text: A plane is in level flight at constant speed and each of its two wings has an area of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>40</mn><mo> </mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>.</mo></math> If the speed of the air is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>180</mn><mo> </mo><mi>km</mi><mo> </mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math> over the lower wing surface and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>252</mn><mo> </mo><mi>km</mi><mo> </mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math> over the upper wing surface, the mass of the plane is ________<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>kg</mi><mo>.</mo></math> (Take air density to be <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mo> </mo><mi>kg</mi><mo> </mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow><mo>–</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo> </mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow><mo>–</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>)

solution.text:
Total wing span area, A=2×40=80 m2

Using Bernoulli's equation, we get uplift force as

AP2-P1=12ρV12-V22A

⇒mg=12×1702-502×80

⇒mg=2400×40

⇒m=9600 kg

data.bucket: Must Do Ques (JEE Main) - Any Difficulty
data.subject: Physics
